review_blob: I enjoyed a flat tire earlier today. Nice gentle beer. Very tasty. Good drinking. A good copy of Newcastle, but nothing beats the original!!

A friend and I imbibed in an American Haake Beck NA and it is the most disgusting thing I ever drank in my entire life. It literally tasted like applesauce, with a rust or metal aftertaste. what a strange beer. We poured most of these down the sink.
I think that this is a good every day beer. fairly bitter, good medium taste that dosent stick around too long.
